Articles.Content:
Hay all just thought id say hello, and ask for some help getting set up.

im not new to space, just been running the demo for ages... it is an awesome little sim

well it was my birthday yesterday so i treated myself to the full thing (happy day)

so been looking for some new toys to play with (parts, mods, addons,) i want to set up some satellites and maybe some offworld bases, can anyone let me know of some nice packs that will let me do that please.

see you all in the black

Hi xRAVENx, welcome to the community

Happy birthday!

For satellites, check these out, Dynasat and Powertech, and for something for your sats to do, ISA mapping, and craft remote control

Welcome to the forums, xRAVENx.

Happy birthday 2 days late, hope you had a good day.

Have a look around in the Add-Ons Section of the forum to find some mods that you really want too add, but sal_vagar has picked some of the best ones.

Have fun playing KSP and on here and go blow up some rockets!
